isletter

Determine which characters are letters.

Syntax

res = isletter(str)

Input argument

str

scalar, vector, matrix or multidimensional array.

Output argument

res

logical array

Description

isletter determines which characters are letters.

Examples

isletter('Nel Son')


isletter("六書 six writings")

See also

toupper.

History

Version Description
1.0.0 initial version

Author

Allan CORNET

<< int2str String type isspace >>
